text.inkscape:label: Flowed Text

tspan.tspan: Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the

text.tspan: typesetting industry. Lorem Ipsum has been the
industry's standard dummy text ever since the
1500s, when an unknown printer took a galley

tspan.tspan: of type and scrambled it to

text.tspan: specimen book. It has survived not only five
unchanged. It was popularised in the 1960s
containing Lorem Ipsum passages, and more recently
with desktop publishing software like Aldus PageMaker

tspan.tspan: واصل دراسته واكملها في الحرم المكي، ثم في جامعة الإمام محمد بن سعود في
الدكتورة في من الجامعة نفسها في
